ERRORS.v1: Sorry, I can't understand the command. Please say again.
ERRORS.v2: Sorry, I didn't get that. Could you say it again?.

HELP.MESSAGE: This is the Alexa Skill for rocket chat. What would you like to do?
HELP.DETAILED_MESSAGE: This is the Alexa Skill for Rocket Chat. You can use this skill to send messages, read unread messages, get your mentions, reading mentioned messages, et cetera. Find more functionalities in the skill description section of the Alexa App.

WELCOME.SUCCESS: Welcome To Rocket Chat Alexa Skill. What Would you like to do today?
WELCOME.SUCCESS_RETURN_USER: Welcome back! What Would you like to do today?
WELCOME.ERROR: To start using this skill, please use the companion app to authenticate.

NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.SUCCESS_USERMENTIONS: I have updated your settings. You will now receive notifications for user mentions only.
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.SUCCESS_UNREADS: I have updated your settings. You will now receive notifications for unread messages only.
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.ERROR: To start receiving notifications from this skill, please use the companion app to give the permission.
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.ERROR_TURNED_OFF: You have turned off the notification settings for this skill. To start receiving notifications again, please use the companion app to give the permission.
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.ERROR_ALREADY_USERMENTIONS: Your notification settings are already set to user mentions.
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS.ERROR_ALREADY_UNREADS: Your notification settings are already set to unread messages.

POST_MESSAGE.ASK_MORE: Would you like to add more?
POST_MESSAGE.SIMILAR_CHANNELS: There are multiple channels with similar name. Please tell the serial number of desired channel. {channel_names}.
POST_MESSAGE.SIMILAR_USERS: There are multiple users with similar username. Please tell the serial number of desired user. {usernames}.
POST_MESSAGE.POST_LONG_MESSAGE_CONFIRMATION: You want to send, {longmessage}, to channel {channelName}, is that correct?
POST_MESSAGE.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
POST_MESSAGE.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't send your message right now.
POST_MESSAGE.DENIED: Okay, I won't send the message.

CREATE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't create the channel {channelName} right now.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_GROUP: Sorry, I couldn't create the group {channelName} right now.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_DUPLICATE_NAME: Sorry, the channel {channelName} already exists. Please try again with different channel name.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_INVALID_NAME: Sorry, {channelName} is not a valid channel name. Please try again with a single word name for the channel.

DELETE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
DELETE_CHANNEL.NOT_AUTHORISED: Sorry, you are not authorised to delete this channel.
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't delete the channel {channelName} right now.
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't find the channel {channelName} right now.
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.DISCUSSION_MESSAGE: You have {total} unread activities and {count} unread messages in {channelName}, {responseString}.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.NO_MESSAGE_IN_DISCUSSION: You don't have any unread messages in {channelName}.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.NO_MESSAGE_IN_DM: You don't have any unread messages from {name}.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.MESSAGE: You Have {unread} Unread Messages in {channelName}. <break time='1s'/> {respString} <break time='0.7s'/>
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.NO_MESSAGE: You Don't Have Any Unread Messages in {channelName}.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't find the channel {channelName} right now.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

MAKE_MODERATOR.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator right now.
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator to {channelName} right now.

ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to the channel right now.
ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to channel {channelName} right now.

ADD_OWNER.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ADD_OWNER.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to the channel right now.
ADD_OWNER.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to channel {channelName} right now.

ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.UNARCHVIE_ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't unarchive this channel right now.
ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't archive this channel right now.

CHANNEL_DETAILS.SET_ANNOUNCEMENT_DENIED: Okay, I won't set the announcement.
CHANNEL_DETAILS.NOT_AUTHORISED: Sorry, You are not authorised to perform this.
CHANNEL_DETAILS.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't do it at the moment.
CHANNEL_DETAILS.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate.
CHANNEL_DETAILS.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't find room named {roomname}.

RESOLVE_CHANNEL.NO_CHANNEL: You are not part of any channel or group named {channel_name}.
RESOLVE_CHANNEL.SIMILAR_CHANNELS: There are multiple channels with similar name. Please tell the serial number of desired channel. {channel_names}.

RESOLVE_USERNAME.NO_USER: There is no user named {username} in your contacts list.
RESOLVE_USERNAME.SIMILAR_USERS: There are multiple users with similar username. Please tell the serial number of desired user. {user_names}.

ROOM_ROLES.REMOVE_LEADER_SUCCESS: {username} is no longer a leader of {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.REMOVE_OWNER_SUCCESS: {username} is no longer an owner of {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.REMOVE_MODERATOR_SUCCESS: {username} is no longer a moderator of {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.ERROR_REMOVE_LAST_OWNER: This is a last owner. Please set a new owner before removing this one.
ROOM_ROLES.USER_NOT_LEADER: There is no leader named {username} in {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.USER_NOT_OWNER: There is no owner named {username} in {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.USER_NOT_MODERATOR: There is no moderator named {username} in {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.USER_NOT_MEMBER: {username} is not a member of room {roomname}.
ROOM_ROLES.ERROR_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, you don't have the right to perform this operation.
ROOM_ROLES.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ROOM_ROLES.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't perform this operation.

LEAVE_CHANNEL.ERROR_LAST_OWNER: You are the last owner, Please set new owner before leaving the room.
LEAVE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't perform this operaton.

ROOM_MENTIONS.NO_MENTIONS: You don't have any mentions in {roomName}.
ROOM_MENTIONS.NO_DM_MENTIONS: You don't have any mentions from DM, {name}.
ROOM_MENTIONS.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't get your mentions

KICK_USER.ERROR_USER_NOT_IN_ROOM: {username} is not a member of room {roomname}.
KICK_USER.ERROR_YOU_ARE_LAST_OWNER: You are last owner. Please set a new owner before leaving room.

PINNED_MESSAGES.SUCCESS: There are {no_of_pinned_messages} pinned messages in the channel {channelname}, here is the latest one. {username} says, {message}.
PINNED_MESSAGES.NO_PINNED_MESSAGES: There are no pinned messages in channel {channelname}.
PINNED_MESSAGES.ERROR: Sorry, I'm unable to process you request.

STATUS.DENIED: Okay, I won't change your status.
STATUS.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't change your status.

UNREADS.NO_UNREADS: You don't have any unread messages.
UNREADS.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't perform this request.

MENTIONS.READ_MENTIONS: You have {count} mentions in {roomName} <break time='0.5s'/> {finalMessage} <break time='0.5s'/>
MENTIONS.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate.
MENTIONS.NO_MENTIONS: You don't have any unread mentions.
MENTIONS.NO_MENTIONS_ROOM: You don't have any unread mentions in {roomName}.
MENTIONS.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't perform this request.

NO_ACTIVE_DISCUSSION: Couldn't find an active discussion named {name} from your discussions.
ROOM_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find a room named {name} from your subscriptions.
FALLBACK_MSG: Sorry, I don't know about that.
ERROR_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, only authorised users can perform this operation.
AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate.
AUDIO_NO_SUPPORT: Sorry, this skill doesn't support that feature.
GENERIC_REPROMPT: Anything else I can help you with?
YES_PROMPT: What would you like to do?
